node.text_en:
ğŸ—“ 7.11 (Sat), 7.12 (Sun) 9am - 9pm, some stations have different opening hours.
ğŸ› You can vote at any station in your LegCo 2020 district (not necessarily in your own 2019 DC Election constituency)
1ï¸âƒ£ Bring your own smartphone and address proof. All voters will cast their vote through official website, there's no need to install any mobile app.
2ï¸âƒ£ Present your HKID card to the station staff for verification.
3ï¸âƒ£ Provide any one of the following documents to the station staff:
(a) Address proof,
(b) Past election poll card
(c) For details please refer to the  official website, Google Map (Last updated on July 6)
